items.title: B2B Marketing: Messaging With Value Proposition Design
items.headline: Differentiate your products and solutions, to focus on customer outcomes, by making your B2B messaging strategic.
objectives_summary: Customer Benefit Value Proposition: Move from a messaging strategy focused on product features to customer benefits and higher-order outcomes.

Competitive Differentiation Value Proposition: Differentiate against competitive solutions by focusing on strengths of your products and deploying FUD (fear, uncertainty, doubt) for competitive solutions.
Customer Application Value Proposition: Move customers from status quo and trigger their need to buy a new product by focusing on customer applications, jobs-to-be-done, and pain points.
